description: This file defines React functional components for different UI states: LoadingState, EmptyState, and ErrorState, which are used to display various status messages within the front-end application.

methods.name: LoadingState({ title = "Loading…" })
methods.description: A React component that renders a loading indicator with a customizable title.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title = "Nothing here", description = "Try adjusting filters or adding a new item." })
methods.description: A React component that displays an empty state message with optional description.

methods.name: ErrorState({ title = "Something went wrong", error, onRetry })
methods.description: A React component that displays an error message with optional retry button.

ctags.name: EmptyState
ctags.pattern: /^export function EmptyState({ title = "Nothing here", description = "Try adjusting filters or add/
ctags.signature: ({ title = "Nothing here", description = "Try adjusting filters or adding a new item." })

ctags.name: ErrorState
ctags.pattern: /^export function ErrorState({ title = "Something went wrong", error, onRetry }) {$/
